bbaw.wsp.parser.harvester

Class MySQLHarvester

  • java.lang.Object
    • bbaw.wsp.parser.harvester.Harvester
      • bbaw.wsp.parser.harvester.MySQLHarvester

  • public class MySQLHarvester
extends Harvester
    Harvest an MySQL database beginning at a specified path and return all accepted resources based on that path. This is a Singleton class.
